description:
Learn the basic concepts, tools, and functions that you will need to build fully functional Games without Coding with the popular Construct2 Game Engine.

Build a strong foundation in Game Development with this tutorial for beginners.

  • Getting Started With Construct2
  • Understanding User Interface and Components
  • Adding Functionality With Behaviours and Events
  • Building Practical Example Games

A Powerful Skill at Your Fingertips
Learning the fundamentals of Game Development puts a powerful and very useful tool at your fingertips. Construct2 is free, easy to learn, has excellent documentation, and is the base for creating professional Games without coding.

Jobs in Game development are plentiful, and being able to learn Game Development will give you a strong background to more easily pick up other Game development tools.

Content and Overview

Suitable for Everyone, through this course of 20 lectures and 1 hour of content, you’ll learn all of the Construct2 Game Development Fundamentals and establish a strong understanding of the concept behind Game Development. Each chapter closes with Quizes, putting your new learned skills into test immediately.

Starting with setting up Construct2, this course will take you through construct2 User Interface, Behaviours and Events and how to use them. By creating Games, you’ll a establish a strong understanding of Game Development process.

With these basics mastered, the course will take you through how to use Events and Behaviours to add complexity and functionality to your programs.

Students completing the course will have the knowledge to create functional and useful Games in minutes without coding.

You’ll be able to work alongside the author as you work through each concept, and will receive a verifiable certificate of completion upon finishing the course.
title: Construct 2 Game Development - Build Games FREE Construct 2
